## What I did

* Alignment of reference sequences;
* Building a phylogenetic tree using FastTree;
* Setting up igraph for network manipulation;
* Setting up cytoscape for visualization;
* Developing and implementing phylo diffusion algorithm for propagating metadata info in the network;
* Performing ancestral sampling using GRASP to get ancestral sequences from the ancestral nodes;
